description: SMMU secure camera logic allows secure camera controllers to access HLOS memory during session in Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear in versions MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9650, MSM8996AU, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, SDA660, SDA845, SDX24, SXR1130.

product.name: Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear
